{{also|Oben}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|obana}}, ultimately from {{cog|gem-pro|*uber}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|de|De-at-oben.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-oben.ogg|Audio}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[above]] # [[north]] # [[upstairs]] # at an earlier point in a text ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|unten}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Venetian== ===Etymology=== Compare {{cog|it|oppure}} ===Conjunction=== {{head|vec|conjunction}} # [[either]], [[or]] ====Usage notes==== * Either duplicated "oben ..... oben" or combined with {{m|vec|o}} "oben ..... o".
